name: Escape House (NekoNeko23)
description:
In this game you have to get out of the house. You can choose part 1 and part 2 (soon you can expect part 3) in the first part you need to reset the system and defend against the monster (use flash). In the second part, just open the padlock and avoid the monster by blessing him.

Okay so far everything wishes you fun :)
